title: US Diplomat Slams Racism Against Indian Americans After Remarks On Harris
content: A senior US diplomat on Monday denounced "vile and racist attacks" on Indian Americans after derogatory remarks were made recently about Vice President Kamala Harris's origins.
summary: A senior US diplomat on Monday denounced "vile and racist attacks" on Indian Americans after derogatory remarks were made recently about Vice President Kamala Harris's origins.

title: Bodycam Video Reveals Arrest Of Man Accused Of Trying To Assassinate Trump
content: A bodycam video, released on Monday, shows the moment police apprehended Ryan Wesley Routh, the 58-year-old man accused of attempting to assassinate former President Donald Trump in Florida.
summary: A bodycam video, released on Monday, shows the moment police apprehended Ryan Wesley Routh, the 58-year-old man accused of attempting to assassinate former President Donald Trump in Florida.

title: US Secret Service Faces Fresh Scrutiny After 2nd Trump Assassination Bid
content: The US Secret Service was facing renewed scrutiny on Monday after a second assassination attempt against former president Donald Trump in two months.
summary: The US Secret Service was facing renewed scrutiny on Monday after a second assassination attempt against former president Donald Trump in two months.

title: Fox News' Fate Hangs In Balance As Murdoch Family Feud Unfolds In US Court
content: A US tribunal began picking over the bitter spat between media magnate Rupert Murdoch and his children Monday in a case that could determine the fate of his empire, including the influential right-wing Fox News.
summary: A US tribunal began picking over the bitter spat between media magnate Rupert Murdoch and his children Monday in a case that could determine the fate of his empire, including the influential right-wing Fox News.

title: Brain Implant Can Now Let Man Control Amazon's Alexa With His Thoughts
content: A patient with a degenerative disease was able to command Amazon's Alexa digital assistant with his mind, the company behind the technological innovation announced Monday, letting him stream shows and control devices with only his thoughts.
summary: A patient with a degenerative disease was able to command Amazon's Alexa digital assistant with his mind, the company behind the technological innovation announced Monday, letting him stream shows and control devices with only his thoughts.

title: Hamas Chief Says Gaza Is "Prepared For Long War"
content: Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar said on Monday the Palestinian group was prepared for prolonged fighting against Israel, in a message to Yemen's Iran-backed Huthi rebels nearly a year into the Gaza war.
summary: Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar said on Monday the Palestinian group was prepared for prolonged fighting against Israel, in a message to Yemen's Iran-backed Huthi rebels nearly a year into the Gaza war.

title: "Bullets Flying, It Will Only Get Worse": Trump Attacks Kamala Harris
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump launched a fierce attack on his Democrat rival Kamala Harris hours after a second assassination attempt on him.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump launched a fierce attack on his Democrat rival Kamala Harris hours after a second assassination attempt on him.

title: Taliban Suspends Polio Vaccination In Afghanistan Despite Rise In Cases
content: The United Nations (UN) announced on Monday that the Taliban has suspended all polio vaccination campaigns in Afghanistan.
summary: The United Nations (UN) announced on Monday that the Taliban has suspended all polio vaccination campaigns in Afghanistan.

title: Who Is Karen Dunn? Top Google Lawyer And Kamala Harris' Debate Coach
content: As US Vice President Kamala Harris prepares to take the stage against former President Donald Trump in her White House bid in November, her secret weapon seems to be a high-powered lawyer with a surprising side gig.
summary: As US Vice President Kamala Harris prepares to take the stage against former President Donald Trump in her White House bid in November, her secret weapon seems to be a high-powered lawyer with a surprising side gig.

title: Greta Thunberg Labelled 'Antisemite Of The Week' By Jewish Advocacy Group
content: "She has sadly transformed her activism into a platform for vile Jew-hatred," the organization added.
summary: "She has sadly transformed her activism into a platform for vile Jew-hatred," the organization added.

title: China, Russia Concerned About India-US Relationship: Top American Diplomat
content: China and Russia are concerned about the strengthening India-US relationship because it promotes inclusivity, peace, and the peaceful resolution of disputes, along with valuing diverse voices in society, a top US diplomat said Monday.
summary: China and Russia are concerned about the strengthening India-US relationship because it promotes inclusivity, peace, and the peaceful resolution of disputes, along with valuing diverse voices in society, a top US diplomat said Monday.

title: 40 Million Projected To Die by 2050 Because Of Drug-Resistant Superbugs
content: Infections of drug-resistant superbugs are projected to kill nearly 40 million people over the next 25 years, a global analysis predicted on Monday, as the researchers called for action to avoid this grim scenario.
summary: Infections of drug-resistant superbugs are projected to kill nearly 40 million people over the next 25 years, a global analysis predicted on Monday, as the researchers called for action to avoid this grim scenario.

title: Benjamin Netanyahu Announces "Updated War Goals" Against, Hamas, Hezbollah
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced an expansion of the country's war goals on Tuesday to include the return of northern residents who fled cross-border fire traded with Hamas ally Hezbollah.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced an expansion of the country's war goals on Tuesday to include the return of northern residents who fled cross-border fire traded with Hamas ally Hezbollah.

title: US Woman Died After Abortion Ban Delayed Her Medical Care: Report
content: Reproductive rights groups erupted in outrage Monday after ProPublica revealed that a Georgia woman died from delayed medical care caused by the US state's restrictive abortion law.
summary: Reproductive rights groups erupted in outrage Monday after ProPublica revealed that a Georgia woman died from delayed medical care caused by the US state's restrictive abortion law.

title: Blinken To Travel To Egypt Today To Discuss Gaza Ceasefire
content: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will travel to Egypt on Tuesday to discuss a Gaza ceasefire and release of hostages with Egyptian officials, the State Department said.
summary: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will travel to Egypt on Tuesday to discuss a Gaza ceasefire and release of hostages with Egyptian officials, the State Department said.

title: UN Chief Condemns "Collective Punishment" Of Palestinians
content: Nothing justifies Israel's collective punishment of the people of Gaza as they endure "unimaginable" suffering, UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres told AFP on Monday.
summary: Nothing justifies Israel's collective punishment of the people of Gaza as they endure "unimaginable" suffering, UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres told AFP on Monday.

title: Suspected Donald Trump Gunman Fired No Shots: US Secret Service
content: The man arrested on suspicion of seeking to assassinate Donald Trump in Florida had no clear line of sight on the former president and did not fire his weapon, the US Secret Service said Monday.
summary: The man arrested on suspicion of seeking to assassinate Donald Trump in Florida had no clear line of sight on the former president and did not fire his weapon, the US Secret Service said Monday.

title: US Secret Service Says It Is Aware Of Musk Post About Biden, Kamala Harris
content: The U.S. Secret Service said on Monday it was aware of a post by billionaire Elon Musk's on the X social media platform musing about a lack of assassination attempts on President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris.
summary: The U.S. Secret Service said on Monday it was aware of a post by billionaire Elon Musk's on the X social media platform musing about a lack of assassination attempts on President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris.

title: Amazon Mandates 5 Days A Week In Office Starting Next Year
content: Amazon.com said on Monday it would require employees to return to the office five days per week, effective January 2, 2025.
summary: Amazon.com said on Monday it would require employees to return to the office five days per week, effective January 2, 2025.

title: Pak Man Pleads Not Guilty To US Assassination Plot Charges
content: A Pakistani man with alleged ties to Iran pleaded not guilty on Monday to charges stemming from an alleged plot to assassinate an American politician in retaliation for the killing of Iran's Revolutionary Guards top commander Qassem Soleimani.
summary: A Pakistani man with alleged ties to Iran pleaded not guilty on Monday to charges stemming from an alleged plot to assassinate an American politician in retaliation for the killing of Iran's Revolutionary Guards top commander Qassem Soleimani.
